A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's definitely a departure from any Star Wars films I seen\, and though I was expecting the fate of one of my beloved characters\, I didn't quite envision it happening the way it did. But I'm not a film director. Johnson's vision is bold and risky and though it has not landed with that infamous demographic that pretty much trashtalks any new Star wars film\, it stuck its landing with the rest.
